entities.name: peeves
entities.description: Peeves is the poltergeist of Hogwarts who started chucking chairs across the room.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student at Hogwarts who was being targeted by Peeves.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is Harry's friend and classmate who helped him with the Summoning Charm.

entities.name: filch
entities.description: Filch is a Hogwarts staff member who would have been attracted to the noise if Peeves hadn't stopped.

entities.name: trevor
entities.description: Trevor is Neville's pet toad that was left in the Gryffindor common room.

relationships.description: Peeves started chucking chairs across the room, pretending to think that Harry wanted things thrown at him.
Hermione helped Harry with the Summoning Charm.
